Title: Establishes a twelve percent surcharge on the sale of animals by pet dealers
Summary: Establishes a twelve percent surcharge on the sale of animals by pet dealers and an animal shelter and wildlife rehabilitator account to be administered by an animal protection organization to be chosen by the comptroller and the commissioner of agriculture and markets.
LawCode: Add §382, Ag & Mkts L; add §99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing a twelve percent surcharge on the sale of animals by pet dealers; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the "New York animal shelter and wildlife rehabilitator account"
